channel.title: NPC Question
channel.description: Alright here's the question: How remove an NPC's ability to walk? And also follow. I want to make a monster thats aggressive, and attacks you when u run by with lets say wind wave but doesn't chase you or walk up to you, it only stays in it's spawn spot. I've seen other servers with the corp beast(aggressive) where the beast doesn't move/chase/run up to you, but it will face you and attack anyone in its lair with mage. My server is a 317 if that helps. THANKS![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2009, 07:36:49 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: NPC Question
item.dc:creator: @hitman2009 hitman2009
item.description:
@hitman2009 wrote:

Alright here’s the question: How remove an NPC’s ability to walk? And also follow. I want to make a monster thats aggressive, and attacks you when u run by with lets say wind wave but doesn’t chase you or walk up to you, it only stays in it’s spawn spot. I’ve seen other servers with the corp beast(aggressive) where the beast doesn’t move/chase/run up to you, but it will face you and attack anyone in its lair with mage. My server is a 317 if that helps. THANKS![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 14, 2009, 07:36:49 pm[/size][hr]anyone?
